titleStmt.title: Orders established the 14th of this present January, by His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax for regulating the army and for the soldiers paying of quarters, and fair behavior in the countreys : together with several letters from His Excellency to the committees and justices of the peace of the several counties to put the said orders in execution.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.

titleStmt.title: Orders established the 14th of this present January, by His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax for regulating the army and for the soldiers paying of quarters, and fair behavior in the countreys : together with several letters from His Excellency to the committees and justices of the peace of the several counties to put the said orders in execution.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: "Published by special command from His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
